summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; approving preliminary plans for a residential planned unit development of certain property on an RM 800 Zone between 16th and 17th Avenues and between East Cherry Street and East Jefferson Streets in Seattle, contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property and Development Agreement (Petition of Sisters of Providence in Washington, C.F. 285078), and amending Plat 41W page 112 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, (Ordinance 86300).
